Override.entitydescription.he-proteinbar1: A somewhat tasty protein bar. Helps to speed up the healing process a bit.
Override.entitydescription.he-chips1: Dried pomegrenade chips. A popular little snack to watch the annual 'DUNWICE FACE-OFF' to.
Override.entitydescription.he-chips2: Dried mutated pomegrenade chips. A popular little snack. It is said to speed up the healing of burns a bit.
Override.entitydescription.he-burgerbun: Used in the making of burgers.
Override.entitydescription.he-breadslices: Two slices of bread. Great for making sandwiches!
Override.entitydescription.he-sandwichbbjam: A tasty sandwich with bubbleberry jam.
Override.entitydescription.he-sandwichpgjam: A tasty sandwich with pomegrenade jam.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedjerky: Dried jerky may taste like leather, but it cannot spoil.
Override.entitydescription.he-spinelingmeatchunk: A piece of spineling meat. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedspinelingkeba: Eating it leaves a stinging sensation.
Override.entitydescription.he-huskmeatchunk: A piece of meat cut from a husk. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedhuskfilet: A boiled lump of husk meat and omelette on the side. Safe to eat.
Override.entitydescription.he-watchermeatchunk: A piece of watcher meat. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-preparedwatcherstea: The taste leaves you staring holes into the air.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedwatchersteak: An ink-black watcher steak and vegetables for color. Eat it slowly, or go insane.
Override.entitydescription.he-molochmeatchunk: A piece of moloch meat. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedmolochsteak: A chewy Moloch steak and its fries, a roadhouse classic.
Override.entitydescription.he-molochsushi: Seasoned Moloch bits rolled in a leaf of Nori.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedcrawlerfilet: Despite being the tastiest part of a crawler, it's still quite awful and chewy.
Override.entitydescription.he-crawlermeatchunk: A Crawler cut in half. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedhumanfilet: A meal of choice, made for and from starving sailors.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedhumanlimbs: Make sure these are not your own crew...
Override.entitydescription.he-mudraptormeatchunk: A nice chunk of meat cut from a Mudraptor. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawmudraptorroast: Time to put it in the oven! Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-preparedmudraptorro: A big slice of Mudraptor roast.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedmudraptorroas: Cold Mudraptor roast slices with a side of popnut and bubbleberry salad.
Override.entitydescription.he-hammerheadmeatchunk: A nice chunk of meat cut from a Hammerhead. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadsparer: Cut from a massive ribcage. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadroast: Time to put it in the oven. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-hammerheadspawnmeat: A Hammerhead baby. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-preparedhammerheadr: A big slice of Hammerhead roast.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedhammerheadroa: Roasted hammerhead with a side of omelette tenderly lying on a bed of sea weed.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedhammerheadspa: While fried hammerhead is the more popular food on stations, seasoned sailors prefer the stronger sweet and sour taste of pickled fish.
Crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside, it makes you feel like the top of the food chain, if only for a moment.
Sweet and tender Hammerhead ribs, best eaten around the bone.
Override.entitydescription.he-threshermeatchunk: A piece of meat cut from a Thresher. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedthresherfilet: A thresher filet, served with fries and some sea weed for freshness.
Override.entitydescription.he-endwormmeatchunk: A fat chunk of meat from an Endworm. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-humanmeatchunk: Parts of a human. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-endwormhotdog: Abandon your religion and prepare for culinary annihilation.
Override.entitydescription.bubbleberries: Very tasty and juicy, they pop under the tongue.
Override.entitydescription.popnut: Kids love to play with them. Needs to be put in water to pop it open and be able to consume it.
Override.entitydescription.popnutpopped: It's popped open, ready to be consumed. Used in some recipes.
Override.entitydescription.badpopnutpopped: It's popped open, ready to be consumed. Used in some recipes. Might be dangerous to leave it in the water.
Override.entitydescription.badpopnut: This nut has more "pop" to it than you'd wish.
Override.entitydescription.badtobaccobud: A mutated variant of a tobacco bud, growing a gelatinous eye-like protrusion full of psychoactive elements.
Override.entitydescription.badsaltbulb: A mutated variant of a salt bulb. Highly unstable.
Override.entitydescription.bubbleberryvineseed: Plant it in a planter to grow bubbleberries.
Override.entitydescription.popnutvineseed: Plant it in a planter to grow Popnuts.
Override.entitydescription.he-energydrink1: A refreshing energy drink. Good for when you're absolutely shit-faced and need to sober up a bit.
Override.entitydescription.rum: A strong alcoholic beverage. |Alcoholic Beverage |Decrease Psychosis |Decrease Hallucinations |Decrease Husk Infection (If below 90%) |Heal Damage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
Override.entitydescription.he-rum: A very strong rum enriched with uranium for extra spice. |Alcoholic Beverage |Decrease Psychosis |Decrease Hallucinations |Decrease Husk Infection (If below 90%) |Healing Properties |Increase Psychosis Resistance |Increase Radiation Sickness (Slightly)
Override.entitydescription.he-whiskey: Doctor Michael's original whiskey. Approved by Doctors europa-wide. |Alcoholic Beverage |Reduce Hallucinations |Reduce Effects of Halucinova |Reduce Chem Addiction |Increase Psychosis Resistance |Slight Healing Properties
Override.entitydescription.he-halucinova: Keep away from "Sadashi Kira" at all cost! |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Hallucinations | Slight Healing Properties
Override.entitydescription.he-beer: A popular beer amongst coalition station inhabitants. |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
Override.entitydescription.he-milk: A bottle of Moloch Milk. Tastes a bit funny. Don't ask how they get milk from a Moloch! May help a bit when you're shit-faced.
Override.entitydescription.he-beercoalitionpremiu: A popular beer amongst coalition station inhabitants. |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
Override.entitydescription.he-beerjovianforce: A beer most popular amongst the Separatists. |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
Override.entitydescription.he-beerliquidascension: A popular beer amongst members of the church of husk on their way to ascension! |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance |Increase Pressure Immunity |Oxygen Not Included |May contain traces of husk parasites
Override.entitydescription.he-beerclownjuice: A popular beer amongst pranksters. Praise the honkmother! |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
Override.entitydescription.he-beerreaperstribute: A strong beer to pay tribute to the reaper. |Alcoholic Beverage |Clear Reaper's Tax |Clears your mind of embarrassment |Increase Psychosis Resistance
Override.entitydescription.he-cupbubbleberrytea: People claim they didn't get thirsty for quite a while after drinking it.
Override.entitydescription.he-cuppopnuttea: People claim they didn't get thirsty for quite a while after drinking it.
Override.entitydescription.he-colacan: A can of Couwola Cola. Good for when you need to sober up.
Override.entitydescription.he-colazerocan: A can of Couwola Cola Zero. No sugar, but full flavor! Good for when you need to sober up.
Override.entitydescription.he-colabottle: A bottle of Couwola Cola. Good for when you need to sober up.
Override.entitydescription.he-colazerobottle: A bottle of Couwola Cola Zero. Zero sugar, but full flavor! Good for when you need to sober up.
Override.entitydescription.he-kegempty: An empty keg used for some recipes. Can be used in water to collect dirty water.
Override.entitydescription.he-kegseawater: A keg full of sea water. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station. Can be cooked into clean water at a stove or brewing kettle. Also used in hydroponic planters.
Override.entitydescription.he-kegwater: A keg full of water. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
Override.entitydescription.he-kegcoalitionpremium: A keg full of Coalition Premium beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
Override.entitydescription.he-kegjovianforce: A keg full of Jovian Force beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
Override.entitydescription.he-kegliquidascension: A keg full of Liquid Ascension beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
Override.entitydescription.he-kegclownjuice: A keg full of Clown Juice beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
Override.entitydescription.he-kegreaperstribute: A keg full of Reaper's Tribute beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
Override.entitydescription.he-kegrum: A keg full of rum. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
Override.entitydescription.he-kegpiraterum: A keg full of pirate rum. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
Override.entitydescription.he-kegwhiskey: A keg full of whiskey. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
Override.entitydescription.he-keghalucinova: A keg full of halucinova. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
Override.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottle: A blueprint of a regular bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
Override.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottlebeer: A blueprint of a beer bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
Override.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottlerum: A blueprint of a rum bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
Override.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottlewhis: A blueprint of a Whiskey bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
Override.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottlehalu: A blueprint of a Halucinova bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
Override.entitydescription.he-blueprintjar: A blueprint of a Jar. Can be used in a bottle printer.
Override.entitydescription.he-blueprintshaker: A blueprint of a Shaker. Can be used in a bottle printer.
Override.entitydescription.he-blueprintcup: A blueprint of a Cup. Can be used in a bottle printer.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptybottlerum: An empty Rum bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptybottlewhiskey: An empty Whiskey bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptybottlehalucino: An empty Halucinova bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptybottlebeer: An empty beer bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptybottle: An empty bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptyjar: An empty jar used for some recipes. Can be thrown.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptyshaker: An empty shaker ready to be filled with salt! Can be thrown.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptybottlerum2: An empty Rum bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptybottlewhiskey2: An empty Whiskey bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptybottlehalucino: An empty Halucinova bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptybottlebeer2: An empty beer bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptybottle2: An empty bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptyjar2: An empty jar used for some recipes. Can be thrown.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptyshaker2: An empty shaker ready to be filled with salt! Can be thrown.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptycup2: An empty cup for drinks. Can be thrown or filled with tea.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawjerky: A pile of salty, raw jerky. Drying it can save even the foulest of meats. Put it in an oven.
Override.entitydescription.he-pepper: Made out of dried out poppy seeds. Pepper be prepared!
Override.entitydescription.he-cookingoil: This one is not used in engines.
Override.entitydescription.he-flour: All natural Europan flour made from crushed seeds treated with a drop of acid.
Override.entitydescription.he-glassfragments: Shattered glass. Can be obtained through smashing bottles or crafting them from quartz at a fabricator. Used for crafting at a fabricator or bottle printer.
Override.entitydescription.he-jambubbleberry: Tasty jam made out of bubbleberries. Known to quench a bit of thirst.
Override.entitydescription.he-jampomegrenade: Tasty jam made out of pomegrenade. Known to be slightly more filling.
Override.entitydescription.he-seaweedstrip: Sea weed pressed and sliced into strips. Let it dry into Nori.
Override.entitydescription.he-nori: Dried and prepared sea weed used for sushi.
Override.entityname.he-icecreambasemilky: Box of Milky Ice Cream Base
Override.entitydescription.he-icecreambasemilky: The base for Milky Ice Cream. Store it in a refrigerated container to make edible ice cream.
Override.entitydescription.he-icecreamboxmilky: A box of Milky Ice Cream. People say they feel more resilient for a longer period of time after eating it. A full box can yield up to 16 scoops of ice cream.
Override.entitydescription.he-icecreamballmilky: A scoop of Milky Ice Cream. People say they feel more resilient for a longer period of time after eating it.
Override.entityname.he-icecreambasepomegrenade: Box of Pomegrenade Ice Cream Base
Override.entitydescription.he-icecreambasepomegre: The base for Pomegrenade Ice Cream. Store it in a refrigerated container to make edible ice cream.
Override.entitydescription.he-icecreamboxpomegren: A box of Pomegrenade Ice Cream. A tasty snack that apparently reduces a bit of pain and makes more resilient. A full box can yield up to 16 scoops of ice cream.
Override.entitydescription.he-icecreamballpomegre: A scoop of Pomegrenade Ice Cream. A tasty snack that apparently reduces a bit of pain and makes more resilient.
Override.entityname.he-icecreambasepopnut: Box of Pop Nut Ice Cream Base
Override.entitydescription.he-icecreambasepopnut: The base for Pop Nut Ice Cream. Store it in a refrigerated container to make edible ice cream.
Override.entityname.he-icecreamboxpopnut: Box of Pop Nut Ice Cream
Override.entitydescription.he-icecreamboxpopnut: A box of Pop Nut Ice Cream. Tastes kind of similar to what chocolate tasted like back on earth. Apparently reduces a bit of pain and makes more resilient. A full box can yield up to 16 scoops of ice cream.
Override.entityname.he-icecreamballpopnut: Ball of Pop Nut Ice Cream
Override.entitydescription.he-icecreamballpopnut: A scoop of Pop Nut Ice Cream. Tastes kind of similar to what chocolate tasted like back on earth. Apparently reduces a bit of pain, makes more resilient and quenches thirst quite good.
Override.entityname.he-icecreambasebubbleberry: Box of Bubble Berry Ice Cream Base
Override.entitydescription.he-icecreambasebubbleb: The base for Bubble Berry Ice Cream. Store it in a refrigerated container to make edible ice cream.
Override.entityname.he-icecreamboxbubbleberry: Box of Bubble Berry Ice Cream
Override.entitydescription.he-icecreamboxbubblebe: A box of Bubble Berry Ice Cream. A very refreshing taste similar to how strawberries tasted like back on earth. Apparently reduces a bit of pain and makes more resilient. A full box can yield up to 16 scoops of ice cream.
Override.entityname.he-icecreamballbubbleberry: Ball of Bubble Berry Ice Cream
Override.entitydescription.he-icecreamballbubbleb: A scoop of Bubble Berry Ice Cream. Tastes kind of similar to what chocolate tasted like back on earth. Apparently reduces a bit of pain, makes more resilient and quenches thirst a little bit.
Override.entitydescription.he-molochcheese: Cheese made from moloch milk. Can be cut into cheese slices.
Override.entitydescription.he-wafflecone: A cone shaped waffle for ice cream. Contained ice cream will melt if not contained within a refrigerated container.
Override.entitydescription.he-enableneeds: [RMB+E] Enables the hunger and thirst afflictions for the user, causing them to have to eat and drink regularly. This is completely optional and is NOT required to gain buffs from eating or drinking. Warning: Can't be disabled for your current character once it is enabled. DO NOT USE WHEN PLAYING WITH 'NEEDS' BY 'LeDoux'!
Override.entitydescription.he-enableextraneeds: [RMB + E] Enables the bladder and defecate afflictions for the user, causing them to have to pee and poop depending on what or how much they eat and drink. This is completely optional and is NOT required to gain buffs from eating or drinking. Warning: Can't be disabled for your current character once it is enabled.
Override.entitydescription.he-cleaver: Time is up! Chop chop!\n\nCan harvest meat from the corpses of creatures.
Override.entitydescription.he-skillbooktheeuropan: "... Peek behind the curtain of time. Is that you, Robert? No, I am Robert. But I am also Doris. I am the meat. Eat of me and become one with the Worm. ..."
Override.entityname.he-skillbookauntdoris: THE ART OF DEEP SEA COOKING by Aunt Doris
Override.entitydescription.he-genesaw: Can extract a random gene from a corpse.
Override.entitydescription.he-antistarve: Used to wake up a patient that lost conciousness due to starvation or thirst.
Override.entitydescription.he-toilet: Relieve yourself or get rid of something by flushing it down.
Override.entitydescription.he-outposttoilet: Variant of the toilet to be used on outpost modules that can't be picked up and moved by the player.
Override.entitydescription.he-cafeteriatable: A moveable table that is commonly used in cafeterias.
Override.entitydescription.he-cafeteriachair: A moveable chair that is commonly used in cafeterias.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptycantonic: An empty aluminium can. Can be deconstructed into aluminium or thrown around.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptycanenergy1: An empty aluminium can. Can be deconstructed into aluminium or thrown around.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptycancola: An empty aluminium can. Can be deconstructed into aluminium or thrown around.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptycancolazero: An empty aluminium can. Can be deconstructed into aluminium or thrown around.
Override.entitydescription.he-couwolaexosuit: A limited edition Exosuit produced by Couwola Cola. It is more fuel efficient and allows the wearer to breath oxygen from their surroundings while only using the oxygen tanks when needed.
Override.entitydescription.he-chefscap1: Show them whose kitchen this is!
Override.entitydescription.he-chefscap2: Show them whose kitchen this is!
Override.entitydescription.he-chefsuniform1: Worn by chefs all across europa!
Override.entitydescription.he-chefsuniform2: Worn by chefs all across europa!
Override.entitydescription.he-kitchencounter: Can store up to 18 different small or medium items. Has built-in power outlets for all your kitchen devices.
Override.entitydescription.he-kitchencounter2: Can store up to 30 different small or medium items.
Override.entitydescription.he-refrigerator: Prevents spoilage. Can only store food and drinks. Needs power.
Override.entitydescription.he-fryer: Used for frying stuff. Needs power.
Override.entitydescription.he-electricgrill: Used for grilling meat. Needs power.
Override.entitydescription.he-distiller: Can be used to either distill ethanol or ferment foods using a natural adjuvant. Needs power.
Override.entitydescription.he-brewkettle: Used to brew kegs of almost any kind of beverage. Needs power.
Override.entitydescription.he-bottleprinter: Used to mass produce bottles. Needs power.
Override.entitydescription.he-refillstation: Used to refill empty bottles from a keg.
Override.entitydescription.he-coolercrate: Used to prevent meat from spoiling. Needs a battery.
Override.entitydescription.he-liquorcrate: Used to store and transport up to 20 bottles of any kind.
Override.entitydescription.he-jarcrate: Used to store and transport up to 8 jars.
Override.entitydescription.he-colacrate: A crate from Couwola Cola to store and carry your bottles. Jars don't fit.
Override.entitydescription.he-liquorcrateshelf: A shelf to store up to 4 of your liquor and jar crates.
Override.entitydescription.he-liquorcrateshelfsma: A small shelf to store up to 2 of your liquor and jar crates.
Override.entitydescription.he-liquordisplayshelf: A shelf to display and store your bottles. Jars don't fit.
Override.entitydescription.he-toolbeltlunch: A Tool Belt with a Lunch Box attached to it to always carry your food with you. Slows you down.
Override.entitydescription.he-lunchbox: It's a box with a handle to carry your food around. Can be attached to a toolbelt at a fabricator.
Override.entitydescription.he-hydroponicplanter: A device providing perfect conditions for europas underwater plants to grow. Yields a plant every 15 minutes. Needs power.
Override.entitydescription.he-cafeteriacart: Used to transport a lot of food and drinks around and or store it in a more accessible area for the crew. Holds up to 30 different foods or drinks. Can be placed.
Override.entitydescription.he-teakettle: Used to refill cups with tea. Requires to be brewed on a stove with a tea mix contained in it.
Override.entitydescription.he-sprinkler: Automatically waters nearby plants with an adjustable timer. Needs power.
Override.jobdescription.he-chef: The chef is responsible for butchering creatures and preparing meals to eat for the crew to ensure that everyone is saturated and happy.
Override.talentdescription.he-hungryeuropan: You're a hungry europan and need to eat and drink regularly.
Override.talentdescription.he-filthyeuropan: You're a special europan and need to urinate and defecate regularly, depending on what you eat and drink.
Override.talentdescription.he-poacher: Gain an additional [xpbonus]% bonus XP and [moneybonus]% bonus marks in [missiontype1] and [missiontype2] missions.
Override.talentdescription.he-saltybusiness: The first time you open a container, you have a chance of [probability]% to find some extra salt in it.
Override.talentdescription.he-fastfood: Move [value]% faster.\nIncrease the speed of kitchen related fabricators by [amount]%.\nDoes not affect [itemname1] and [itemname2].
Override.talentdescription.he-chefattire: Unlock the crafting recipes for [itemname1] and [itemname2].
Override.talentdescription.he-frenzy: Deal [powerincrease]% more damage with ‖color:gui.orange‖Meat Cleavers‖end‖.\nIncrease your working speed on the cutting board by [amount]%.
Override.talentdescription.he-butchershop: You're a talented butcher and it shows!\nGet [amount]% more money when selling meat!
Override.talentdescription.he-coldblood: You're the coolest person around.\n‖color:gui.orange‖Meat‖end‖ no longer spoils and ‖color:gui.orange‖Ice Cream‖end‖ no longer melts in your inventory.
Override.talentdescription.he-masterchef: You've become a master of your work and learned how to save some ingredients for later when cooking.\nYou have a [chance]% chance to not consume a random ingredient while preparing a meal.
Override.talentdescription.he-delicacies: Unlock the following recipes of europan delicacies:\n[itemname1]\n[itemname2]
Override.talentdescription.he-huskfood: You can now turn the meat of a [itemname1] into edible food.
Override.talentdescription.he-masterbrewer:
Unlock the following recipes of europan beverages:
[itemname1]
[itemname2]
[itemname3]
Override.talentdescription.he-tastyfood: Your food is known to be amongst the best. If they are not hungry, crewmates gain ‖color:gui.orange‖High Morale‖end‖. If they are stuffed, they gain ‖color:gui.orange‖Excellent Morale‖end‖ instead, doubling the following bonuses:
Override.talentdescription.he-piper:
Playing the bagpipes near your crew grants them the following bonuses for the duration you're playing:
‖color:gui.orange‖20 to Weapons
20% Increased Walking Speed
25% Increased Melee Damage
25% Damage Resistance ‖end‖.
Override.talentdescription.he-lazygardener: The time spent watering your plants was just too much for you.
Override.talentdescription.he-farmersmarket: You can sell prepared food for [amount]% more.
Override.talentdescription.he-steadyhands: While aiming with a melee weapon, gain [amount]% stun resistance.
Override.talentdescription.he-foodtrucking: Gain a bonus of [helmbonus] ‖color:gui.orange‖Helm‖end‖ skill.\nWhen entering a friendly habitation outpost, gain [outpost]mk.
Override.talentdescription.he-dietarypreferenceba: Choose one type of enemy and gain a [amount]% damage boost against it. \nYou gain [percent]% more food buffs when eating.
Override.talentdescription.he-dietarypreferencemu: Choose ‖color:gui.orange‖Mudraptors‖end‖ as your preference and gain [amount]% increased damage dealt against them.
Override.talentdescription.he-dietarypreferencecr: Choose ‖color:gui.orange‖Crawlers‖end‖ as your preference and gain [amount]% increased damage dealt against them.
Override.talentdescription.he-dietarypreferenceth: Choose ‖color:gui.orange‖Threshers‖end‖ as your preference and gain [amount]% increased damage dealt against them.
Override.talentdescription.he-dietarypreferencesp: Choose ‖color:gui.orange‖Spinelings‖end‖ as your preference and gain [amount]% increased damage dealt against them.
Override.talentdescription.he-dietarypreferencehu: Choose ‖color:gui.orange‖Husks‖end‖ as your preference and gain [amount]% increased damage dealt against them.
Override.talentdescription.he-culinaryschool: After completing a mission, the first ‖color:gui.orange‖Gourmet‖end‖ meal you cook earns you a ‖color:gui.orange‖Commendation‖end‖.
Override.talentdescription.he-thinnerslices: Gain a [chance]% chance to not consume raw meat when cooking.
Override.talentdescription.he-seafoodsamurai: If you are in the open sea, gain an additional [amount]% [stattype].
Override.talentdescription.he-dinnertheater: Playing the bagpipes prolongs the duration of food and drink buffs for you and nearby allies.
Override.talentdescription.he-teppanyaki: Whenever you gain a [skillname1] or [skillname2] skill point, your crew gains a point as well.\nDeal [powerincrease]% more damage with ‖color:gui.orange‖Pans‖end‖.
Override.talentdescription.he-headchef: Allies in the same room gain [amount]% [stattype].
Override.talentdescription.he-creamery: Recipes that consume [item] have a [chance]% chance to not consume one.\n‖color:gui.orange‖Molochs‖end‖ are less aggressive towards you.
Override.talentdescription.he-shortorderchef: Cooking ‖color:gui.orange‖Fast-Food‖end‖ has a [chance]% chance to cook a second one for free.\nAfter cooking fast-food, you gain [amount]% physical damage resistance and cannot be ‖color:gui.orange‖unconscious‖end‖ for 10 seconds.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-hunger.other.lo: The patient is starting to get a small appetite.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-hunger.lethal.o: The patient is starting to starve.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-thirst.other.lo: The patient is starting to get thirsty.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-thirst.lethal.o: The patient is starting to die of thirst.
Override.afflictiondescription.quenched.other: The patient's thirst is quenched. They won't get thirsty for awhile.
Override.afflictiondescription.bladder.self.high: Your bladder is too full! You might leak out at any moment!
Override.afflictiondescription.bladder.other: The patient could take a piss.
Override.afflictiondescription.bladder.other.high: The patient's bladder is almost bursting! They should take a piss!
Override.afflictiondescription.defecate: What goes in must come out.
Override.afflictiondescription.defecate.self.high: You are struggling to hold it in! Seek the nearest toilet!
Override.afflictiondescription.defecate.other.low: The patient has good bowel movement.
Override.afflictiondescription.defecate.other: The patient looks sweating and constipated.
Override.afflictiondescription.defecate.other.hig: The patient's sphincter is about to give out!
Override.afflictiondescription.embarrassment: You feel embarrassed and can't focus on your work.
Override.afflictiondescription.embarrassment.othe: The patient seems embarrassed and can't focus on anything.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-dieofthirst.oth: The patient is dying of thirst.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-cannibalskillin: All your skills are increased by 20%
Override.afflictiondescription.he-disguisedashusk: Ugh... you reek of husk infected flesh! Husks will probably accept you as one of their own.
Ugh... The patient reeks of husk infected flesh!
Override.afflictiondescription.he-alcoholism: The patient is happy enough... so long as they get what they need.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-al: It's time for a booze cruise! You're addicted to alcohol.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-alcoholwithdraw: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, as are the signs of nausea.
Override.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-alcoholwit: You have died of alcohol withdrawal.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-al: You have the feeling it's time to open up another cold one with the boys!
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient shows light signs of alcohol withdrawal.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-al: A cold beer or a bottle of rum... Anything to quench this horrible thirst for alcohol!
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient shows heavy signs of alcohol withdrawal.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-cannibalism: The patient is happy enough... so long as they get what they need.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-ca: Uh oh! Seems like you like the taste of your fellow crewmates.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The patient certainly likes a special type of meat.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-hungryforhumanm: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, the eyes stare empty.
Override.afflictioncauseofdeath.he-hungryforhuman: Lost their mind over human meat.
Override.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-hungryforh: You lost your mind over human meat.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-hu: Your crewmates are starting to look quite tasty!
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient gives you a cold stare.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-hu: You are struggling to focus on anything. You crave for human flesh. You want to murder. Your arms grow stronger just by thinking about it.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient gives you a cold stare and is severly twitching.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-hu: You have an irresistible desire to bite into your crewmates. It's the only way to appease the craving.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient has acquired a craving for human meat. Do not approach your hand if you want to keep your fingers.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-drunkinvertcont: Up is down and left is... right? Where am I?
Override.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-stuffed: You have choked on your own vomit.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-st: The stomach is at its limit. Eating more might cause you to vomit.
The stomach is too full. You feel the need to vomit.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The stomach is full. The patient had enough to eat.
The stomach is very full. The patient had almost too much to eat.
The stomach is too full. The patient might vomit.
Override.afflictiondescription.self.he-internalbu: Your throat feels irritated and giving off a slight burning sensation.
Your throat is giving off a very painful burning sensation. Swallowing hurts.
Your throat burns like an open fire. You can barely speak.
Override.afflictiondescription.others.he-internal: The throat is red and irritated. The patient must've consumed a highly alcoholic beverage.
The throat is severely irritated from drinking strong alcoholic beverages. The patient should probably stop drinking for a while.
The throat is growing blisters. The patient must be in agony and should stop further alcohol consumption immediately!
Override.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-stomachach: You have choked on your own vomit.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-st: The stomach hurts and you feel slightly nauseous.
The stomach hurts a lot and you're feeling very nauseous.
Override.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The patient suffers from abdominal pain. They must have ingested something unsafe for consumption.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-butchered: The corpse is being butchered for meat.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-halucinova.self: You feel like traveling to a different plane of existence.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-halucinova.othe: The person is clearly zoning out.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-drankpaint.self: Oooooh that's some strong paint right there!
Override.afflictiondescription.he-drankpaint.othe: For some reason the patient thought it would be a good idea to inhale industrial paint. They are, for lack of a better term, out of their gourd.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-drankredpaint.s: Bruh... That's some strong paint right there! Kind of tastes like... pomegrenade?
Override.afflictiondescription.he-drankredpaint.o: The patient consumed and is high on red paint. You can tell by the stains around the mouth.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-drankgreenpaint: Wooooow... That's some strong paint right here! Do I taste salt bulb?
The patient consumed and is high on green paint. You can tell by the stains around the mouth.
Huh?!? Wha? Water! No? Yeah... This water tastes weeeeiiiiiirrrrd!
The patient consumed and is high on blue paint. You can tell by the stains around the mouth.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-drankblackpaint: Blyat! That definitely wasn't Couwola Cola! Though it tastes a little bit like it...
The patient consumed and is high on black paint. You can tell by the stains around the mouth.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-drankwhitepaint: My teeth probably never looked better! I bet they're the shiniest on all of Europa!
The patient consumed and is high on white paint. You can tell by the stains around the mouth. The teeth look very good though! Probably the best looking teeth you've ever seen.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-battlemusic: This music get's you going. You feel tougher, stronger, faster and more skilled with weapons. You're ready for battle!
Override.afflictiondescription.he-apprenticechef: You are prepared to cook under the guidance of a skilled chef.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-steadyhands: Your hands are steady and your nerve is unflinching.
Override.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.regular: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT REGULAR BOTTLES.
Override.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.beer: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT BEER BOTTLES.
Override.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.rum: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT RUM BOTTLES.
Override.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.whiskey: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT WHISKEY BOTTLES.
Override.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.halucinova: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT HALUCINOVA BOTTLES.
Override.bottleprinter.infotext.jar: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT JARS.
Override.bottleprinter.infotext.shaker: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT SHAKERS.
Override.bottleprinter.infotext.cup: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT CUPS.
Override.bottleprinter.missingitem.blueprint: MATERIAL INSERTED\nERROR: NO BLUEPRINT FOUND! PLEASE INSERT A BLUEPRINT.
Override.bottleprinter.missingitem.glassfragments: BLUEPRINT INSERTED\nERROR: NO GLASS FRAGMENTS FOUND! PLEASE INSERT GLASS FRAGMENTS.
Override.bottleprinter.empty: INSERT GLASS FRAGMENTS AND PICK A BLUEPRINT TO BEGIN FABRICATION\n------------------------------------------\nINSERT CRATE IN OUTPUT SLOT
Override.distiller.flourmixture: READY TO DISTILL SYNTHETIC FLOUR MIXTURE
Override.distiller.empty: PLEASE INSERT ONE OF THE FOLLOWING:\n-PACK OF SUGAR
Override.distiller.missingitem.yeastshroom: SUGAR INSERTED\nERROR: NO YEAST SHROOM FOUND! PLEASE INSERT 1X YEASTSHROOM.
Override.distiller.missingitem.sulphuricacid: PULVERIZED SEEDS PACK INSERTED\nERROR: NO ACID FOUND! PLEASE INSERT 1X SULPHURIC ACID.
Override.itemmsgnomeatleft: No meat left on this corpse...
Override.entitydescription.popnutleaf: Can be used to make tea.
Override.entitydescription.bananaseed: Can be used to make tea.
A slice of a regular, plain europan banana. Can be planted.
Override.entitydescription.pomacco: A somewhat disgusting but addictive cross between a pomegrenade and tobacco. Soothes the nerves and the stomach.
Override.entitydescription.pomaccoseed: A genetically engineered seed of the hybrid plant Pomacco.
Override.entitydescription.saltgrenade: Salty and juicy, this pomegrenade and salt bulb hybrid helps dealing with blood loss when consumed. Keep away from water.
Override.entitydescription.saltgrenadeseed: A genetically engineered seed of the hybrid plant Saltgrenade.
Override.entitydescription.raptorpom: Has the juiciness of a pomegrenade, but also the toxicity of raptor bane. The stench attracts monsters and drives them crazy.
Override.entitydescription.raptorpomseed: A genetically engineered seed of the hybrid plant known as Raptor Bait.
Override.entitydescription.raptorbacco: Combining the toxic properties of raptor's bane and tobacco, this psychoactive fruit enhances physical performance at the cost of your sanity.
Override.entitydescription.raptorbaccoseed: A genetically engineered seed of the hybrid plant Raptor Nip.
Override.entitydescription.bananacigar: A hollow banana sprouting dry tobacco leaves which can be smoked directly. Makes you look cool among clowns, and like a clown among others...
Override.entitydescription.bananacigarseed: A genetically engineered slice of the hybrid plant Bananacco. Can be planted.
Override.entitydescription.bananagun: Packed with potent sodium, this banana can be squeezed to let out a volley of fruity shrapnel.
Override.entitydescription.bananagunseed: A genetically engineered slice of the hybrid plant Bananabulb. Can be planted.
Override.entitydescription.bananafuelrod: This inexplicably irradiated banana is warm to the touch, and hard to the tooth. Clowns are known to use these as emergency reactor fuel...
Override.fabricationdescription.fertilizeringredi: Organic waste that can be recycled as fertilizer ingredients.
Override.afflictiondescription.hygiene.self.high: You stink, and your skin has a layer of muck.
Override.afflictiondescription.hygiene.other.low: The patient is as clean a sailor can be.
Override.afflictiondescription.hygiene.other.medi: The patient could use a good scrub.
Override.afflictiondescription.hygiene.other.high: An foul odor emanates from the patient due to their execrable hygiene.
Override.afflictiondescription.fatigue: A tired worker is a bad worker.
Override.afflictiondescription.fatigue.self.high: You might fall asleep at any time.
Override.afflictiondescription.fatigue.other.medi: The patient could probably use some rest.
Override.afflictiondescription.fatigue.other.high: The patient suffers from acute sleep deprivation.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-calciumrich: Strengthens the bones and helps with digestion.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-fatrich: Healthy fat greases your joints! You move faster.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-proteinrich: Bulk up! You swing harder and feel like holding a gun.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-vitaminrich: Stimulates red blood cells. Hold your breath for longer and reduce bleed less.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-sugarrich: The sugar rush keeps you focused. Learn faster, improves the mood and fatigue.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-fiberrich: Fibers help with digestion and stomachache.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-watchermindsens: Watcher juices flow through you. Learn faster and see the hidden truth of the world.
Override.afflictiondescription.he-tobaccoaddictio: It's bad for your lungs. You feel short of breath.
Override.afflictiondescription.caffeinated: You feel less tired, and a bit faster.
Override.afflictiondescription.worminfection: You ate some bad food and can now feel worms wriggling in your stomach. Treat with antibiotics.
Override.afflictiondescription.tapeworminfection: A very hungry tapeworm lodged itself inside your bowels, and it's making you peckish. Treat with antibiotics.
Override.fabricationdescription.smallegg: Any alien egg of small caliber.
Override.entitydescription.shotgunshellsalt: A makeshift shotgun shell containing good old sodium chloride. Ought to put salt in the wound.
Override.entitydescription.he-popnutbubblesalad: A healthy and colorful Popnut-Bubbleberry fruit salad.
Override.entitydescription.he-huskcaviarnori: Husk eggs gently laying on nori leaves. You were told a splash of vinegar sterilizes the parasite.
Override.entitydescription.he-potcrawyum: A starchy soup made of boiled crawler parts. Sometimes eyeballs float up.
Override.entitydescription.he-crawyumsoup: A starchy soup made of boiled crawler parts. Sometimes eyeballs float up.
Override.entitydescription.he-potbonebroth: Moloch Meat boiled with its bone. The perfect remedy for hangovers.
Override.entitydescription.he-bonebroth: Moloch Meat boiled with its bone. The perfect remedy for hangovers.
Override.entitydescription.he-potseaweedsoup: A vegetarian soup with boiled nori and seeds. Quenches thirst nicely.
Override.entitydescription.he-seaweedsoup: A vegetarian soup with boiled nori and seeds. Quenches thirst nicely.
Override.entitydescription.he-potfondue: A rich dish, savored by dipping cubes of bread into a pool of melted cheese.
Override.entitydescription.he-fondue: A rich dish, savored by dipping cubes of bread into a pool of melted cheese.
Override.entitydescription.he-mrepacket: Open it up to get 2 MRE rations.
Override.entitydescription.he-mreration: A ready-to-eat meal of uncertain composition that does not spoil. Just pour water in and enjoy the moist gruel.
Override.entitydescription.he-fermentedcabbage: Vegetable leaves bleached and fermented gain an especially sour taste.
Override.entitydescription.he-fermentedraptorbane: When fermented, Raptor's Bane loses its toxicity, becoming tender and bitter. Even a raptor could eat it.
Override.entitydescription.he-fermentedsaltbulb: Bacteria decomposes Salt Bulbs in the right environment, removing all its deadly saltiness and giving it a subtle touch of acidity.
Override.entitydescription.he-molochefort: Half-rotten Moloch blue cheese exposed to bacteria; the result is surprisingly not deadly. Boosts your immune system.
Override.entitydescription.he-sauerkraut: Sausages and fermented cabbage. Best enjoyed with a beer and some yodeling.
Override.entitydescription.he-molochtartare: Ground Moloch meat served raw with a cracked egg on top.
Override.entitydescription.he-preparedmolochsteak: Moloch steak, seared with the largest pan you have. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawoffal: Small bits and pieces of organ meats. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-blender: A blender that can be used for juices and smoothies. Requires Power.
Override.entitydescription.he-pomberryjuiceglass: A glass of fresh Pomegrenade-Bubbleberry juice.
Override.entitydescription.he-dirtypot: This pot is stained with gunk. Clean it in a sink.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptybowl: A ceramic bowl. Don't drop it.
Override.entitydescription.he-dirtybowl: This bowl is stained with gunk. Clean it in a sink.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptyplate: A ceramic plate. Don't throw it.
Override.entitydescription.he-dirtyplate: This plate is stained with gunk. Clean it in a sink.
Override.entitydescription.he-pan: Use on the stove to cook food, use on crewmates to discipline them.
Override.entitydescription.he-milkingtool: A tool with a pacifying effect used by divers to extract lactic secretions from live Molochs. Infamous among lone beacon keepers...
Override.entitydescription.he-rawfries: Out of the pom, into the fryer.
Override.entitydescription.he-poutine: Fries topped with melted cheese and a thick sauce. As greasy as it is delicious.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawnuggets: A pile of raw nuggets. Put it in a fryer.
Override.entitydescription.he-burger: A culinary classic, the building brick of space colonization. Some say a healthy Europan is half water, half burger.
Override.entitydescription.he-hotdog: Grab a bite while watching mudraptor races.
Override.entitydescription.he-pizza: A flat base of dough, a good dose of cheese, flakes of meat and most important of all, sweet sliced fruit to honor the old earthian recipe. Cut yourself a piece!
Override.entitydescription.he-madnessmeal:
Contents:
 - 1x Burger
 - 8x Nuggets
 - 1x Can of Couwola Cola
 - 1x Random Toy
Override.entitydescription.he-rawsausage: Expect the wurst! Grill it or boil it. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawendwormsausage: Expect the endwurst! Grill it or boil it. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawmeatpatty: Cook it on the grill. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawspinelingslices: Chopped up Spineling. Grill it or sear it. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-spinelingslices: Cooked up Spineling. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-proteinalgaecake: There is way more algae than protein in these. You could say the cake is a lie.
Override.entitydescription.he-teamixbubbleberry: Finely chopped Bubbleberry leaves. Brew it in a kettle.
Override.entitydescription.he-teamixpopnut: Finely chopped Popnut leaves. Brew it in a kettle.
Override.entitydescription.he-coffeemix: Coffee was said to be so addictive back on earth, it was replaced with the more healthy alternative of crushed tobacco buds.
Override.entitydescription.he-chocolatemix: Add lots of milk and sugar to forget the fact that Europa ran out of real cocoa half a century ago.
Override.entitydescription.he-cupcoffee: To the bitter end. Prevents thirst.
Override.entitydescription.he-mugcoffee: To the bitter end. Prevents thirst.
Override.entitydescription.he-coffeetogo: To the bitter end. Prevents thirst.
Override.entitydescription.he-cuphotchocolate: Warms up the coldest of sailors. Prevents thirst.
Override.entitydescription.he-mughotchocolate: Warms up the coldest of sailors. Prevents thirst.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawcrawlerfilets: Slices of Crawler meat. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-preparedcrawlerfile: Crawler filets, roasted in an oven.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawhumanfilets: Slices of human meat. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-preparedhumanfilets: Human filets, roasted in an oven.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawthresherfilets: Slices of Thresher meat. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.entitydescription.he-preparedthresherfil: Thresher filets, roasted in an oven.
Override.entitydescription.he-rawhuskfilets: Select Husk morsels, does not include stingers. Spoils if not refrigerated.
Override.talentdescription.he-sleepyeuropan: Make sure to take a rest in a bed from time to time.
Override.talentdescription.he-moodyeuropan: Keep your stress low by enjoying foods and drinks you like.
Override.eventtext.he-hirechef.freechef: "Oh hello! You're from that submarine that just docked, aren't you? You don't happen to be in need of a new chef? I'm looking for work, but I'm not needed on this station."
Override.eventtext.he-hirechef.expensivechef: "Hey, you're from that submarine that just docked, right? This shithole of a station just terminated my contract, and I'm looking for a crew."
Override.eventtext.he-hirechef.howmuch: "We could use a cook. How much is this going to cost?"
Override.eventtext.he-hirechef.joinfree: "I'll join your crew for free! Just get me out of this hole, all I need are kitchen tools and I'll start cooking."
Override.eventtext.he-hirechef.joinexpensive: "A mere 1250mk. That should cover my gambling debts and any future drinking expenses."
Override.eventtext.he-hirechef.nomoney: "Sorry but I don't work for free. Feel free to come back when you can afford my services."
Override.eventtext.he-hirechef.changeyourmind: "Really now? Man I was hoping to finally get away from this place... Well, I'm here if you change your mind."
Override.eventtext.he-hirechef.buykitchen: "Too bad. See if you can check the store, they might have the basics: a cutting board, a sink..."
Override.entitydescription.he-enablesleep: [RMB + E] EXTRA OPTIONAL: Enables tiredness affliction for the user, causing them to have to sleep regularly. Warning: Can't be disabled for your current character once it is enabled.
Override.entitydescription.he-enablemood: [RMB + E] EXTRA OPTIONAL: Enables the mood affliction for the user, causing them to get stressed from working. Reduce your stress by eating food of choice, drinking, using drugs or relaxing. Warning: Can't be disabled for your current character once it is enabled.
Override.entitydescription.sink: Provides fresh water and cleans tableware.
Override.entitydescription.coffeemachine: Brews a nice cup of coffee.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptycup: An empty cup for drinks. Can be thrown or filled with a hot beverage.
Override.entitydescription.he-dirtycup: Dirty. Wash it in the sink.
Override.entitydescription.he-emptymug: An empty mug for drinks. Can be thrown or filled with a hot beverage.
Override.entitydescription.he-dirtymug: Dirty. Wash it in the sink.
Override.entitydescription.he-cannedcorn: A rare can of old Earthian vegetables, when supplies were still being delivered from outer space.
Override.entitydescription.he-cannedcornopen: A rare can of old Earthian vegetables, when supplies were still being delivered from outer space.
Override.entitydescription.he-cannedmushrooms: A rare can of old Earthian vegetables, when supplies were still being delivered from outer space.
Override.entitydescription.he-cannedmushroomssope: A rare can of old Earthian vegetables, when supplies were still being delivered from outer space.
Override.entitydescription.he-cannedpotatoes: A rare can of old Earthian vegetables, when supplies were still being delivered from outer space.
Override.entitydescription.he-cannedpotatoesopen: A rare can of old Earthian vegetables, when supplies were still being delivered from outer space.
Override.entitydescription.he-cannedtomatoes: A rare can of old Earthian vegetables, when supplies were still being delivered from outer space.
Override.entitydescription.he-cannedtomatoesopen: A rare can of old Earthian vegetables, when supplies were still being delivered from outer space.
Override.entitydescription.he-colaradiantbottle: Feeling Overcharged! A special edition bottle of Couwola Cola, enriched with fulgurium.
Override.entitydescription.he-dough: A ball of dough, rolled by hopefully clean hands.
Override.entitydescription.he-fishtailcocktail: A festive alcoholic drink to forget your troubles.
Override.entitydescription.he-shivcommon: A sharp, broken bottle used as a weapon in bar fights.
Override.entitydescription.he-bagpipes: An ancient instrument from earth consisting of an inflatable bladder, a mouthpiece and several metal pipes that produce haunting melodies.
Override.eventtext.manualenforceinfo:
List of enforce manual needs commands (only applies to PLAYERS, not bots):
‖color:gui.yellow‖manualenforcehungry‖end‖ (Hunger and Thirst)
‖color:gui.yellow‖manualenforcefilthy‖end‖ (Bladder, Poop, Hygiene)
‖color:gui.yellow‖manualenforcesleepy‖end‖ (Fatigue, Sleep)
‖color:gui.yellow‖manualenforcemoody‖end‖ (Stress. NOT RECOMMENDED. Use syringe instead)
‖color:gui.red‖manualenforceallneeds‖end‖ (all of the above)
